engSearchText:
I wasn't sure I could even perfect the zeroth form
after being told to do it out of nowhere...

jpnSearchText:
《零の型》、勝手に仕上げろなんて
言われた時はどうしようかと思ったけど。

engChrName: ...but I think I've earned the right to hold my head up high to Master's younger disciple now.
engSearchText:
...but I think I've earned the right to hold my head up
high to Master's younger disciple now.

jpnSearchText: これならあの“弟弟子”にも胸を張れそうかな？

engChrName: Not that I can see him joining us up on stage anytime soon.
engSearchText:
Not that I can see him joining us up on stage
anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ま、こちらの舞台で見（まみ）える機会は しばらくは無さそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ま、こちらの舞台で見（まみ）える機会は
しばらくは無さそうだけど……

engChrName: All is ready, Princess.
engSearchText: All is ready, Princess.
jpnChrName: 姫──万事整いましてございます。
jpnSearchText: 姫──万事整いましてございます。

engChrName: In record time, too.
engSearchText: In record time, too.
jpnChrName: うん、ご苦労様。
jpnSearchText: うん、ご苦労様。

engChrName: We couldn't have asked for a bigger client, and this is the first long-term contract we've had in a while.
engSearchText:
We couldn't have asked for a bigger client, and this is
the first long-term contract we've had in a while.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、スポンサーは最大級だし、 下見も含めて久しぶりの長期契約だ。
jpnSearchText:
──まあ、スポンサーは最大級だし、
下見も含めて久しぶりの長期契約だ。

engChrName: We can afford to take it easy for our first task, at least.
engSearchText:
We can afford to take it easy for our first task,
at least.
jpnChrName: 最初のお仕事くらいは緩めに行こうか。
jpnSearchText: 最初のお仕事くらいは緩めに行こうか。

engChrName: But the time has come to reaffirm our existence to the world. Tread lightly, for the Ikaruga lurk in the shadows.
engSearchText:
But the time has come to reaffirm our existence to
the world. Tread lightly, for the Ikaruga lurk in
the shadows.
jpnChrName: 我らは改めて存在を示せばいい。 ──此の地に《斑鳩（いかるが）》ありと。
jpnSearchText:
我らは改めて存在を示せばいい。
──此の地に《斑鳩（いかるが）》ありと。

engChrName: So she noticed us. I should have known we couldn't deceive the Divine Blade of Silver.
engSearchText:
So she noticed us. I should have known we couldn't
deceive the Divine Blade of Silver.
jpnChrName: 気付かれていたか…… 流石は名高き《白銀（しろがね）の剣聖》。
jpnSearchText:
気付かれていたか……
流石は名高き《白銀（しろがね）の剣聖》。

engChrName: This is a reconnaissance in force mission. We only need assess their capabilities, not win the battle.
engSearchText:
This is a reconnaissance in force mission. We only
need assess their capabilities, not win the battle.
jpnChrName: ──今回は威力偵察、 戦力分析できればそれでいい。
jpnSearchText:
──今回は威力偵察、
戦力分析できればそれでいい。

engChrName: Our foes are both above S-rank in strength. Strike in the Blitz Halberd formation!
engSearchText:
Our foes are both above S-rank in strength. Strike in
the Blitz Halberd formation!
jpnChrName: 脅威度Ｓ級オーバーの使い手２名、 《雷光の斧槍（ブリッツハルベルト）》で仕掛けるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
脅威度Ｓ級オーバーの使い手２名、
《雷光の斧槍（ブリッツハルベルト）》で仕掛けるぞ！

engChrName: Ja!
engSearchText: Ja!
jpnChrName: Ｊａ（ヤー）！！
jpnSearchText: Ｊａ（ヤー）！！
ッ……！？

engChrName: I'd planned to depart for the East after speaking with him...
engSearchText:
I'd planned to depart for the East after speaking
with him...
jpnChrName: ……ご隠居に挨拶したらそのまま “東”に顔を出すつもりであったが。
jpnSearchText:
……ご隠居に挨拶したらそのまま
“東”に顔を出すつもりであったが。

engChrName: How fortunate that I was able to catch a glimpse of the living legend's covert student before doing so.
engSearchText:
How fortunate that I was able to catch a glimpse of
the living legend's covert student before doing so.
jpnChrName: かの伝説殿の“裏”弟子── なるほど大したものだ。
jpnSearchText:
かの伝説殿の“裏”弟子──
なるほど大したものだ。

engChrName: I cannot help but wonder what she fights for with those unusual talents of hers...
engSearchText:
I cannot help but wonder what she fights for with
those unusual talents of hers...
jpnChrName: ……その異常なる天稟（てんぴん）、 何のために振るうかは気になるが。
jpnSearchText:
……その異常なる天稟（てんぴん）、
何のために振るうかは気になるが。

engChrName: ...but that mystery, along with what lurks here beneath the Kunlun Mountains under Calvard's stormy skies, will have to wait.
engSearchText:
...but that mystery, along with what lurks here
beneath the Kunlun Mountains under Calvard's
stormy skies, will have to wait.
jpnChrName: ……風雲渦巻くカルバードの片隅、 崑崙の膝元での秘め事。
jpnSearchText:
……風雲渦巻くカルバードの片隅、
崑崙の膝元での秘め事。

engChrName: Now is not the time to investigate further.
engSearchText: Now is not the time to investigate further.
jpnChrName: 気になるが今は捨て置くとしよう。
jpnSearchText: 気になるが今は捨て置くとしよう。

engChrName: ...Though it would be a shame to let this encounter go to waste.
engSearchText:
...Though it would be a shame to let this encounter
go to waste.
jpnChrName: ──だが、またとない縁。
jpnSearchText: ──だが、またとない縁。

engChrName: It might be worth pitting my own greenhorn student against her to see how he fares.
engSearchText:
It might be worth pitting my own greenhorn student
against her to see how he fares.
jpnChrName: それこそ我が不肖の裏弟子を けしかけてもいいかもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ我が不肖の裏弟子を
けしかけてもいいかもしれんな。
──────

engChrName: An enemy attack? No...
engSearchText: An enemy attack? No...
jpnChrName: 敵の仕掛け……ううん。
jpnSearchText: 敵の仕掛け……ううん。
…………………………………

engChrName: What do we have here? A paranormal being?
engSearchText: What do we have here? A paranormal being?
jpnChrName: フフ、妖異の類いのようだけど……
jpnSearchText: フフ、妖異の類いのようだけど……

engChrName: Oh, but there's more at work here than that...
engSearchText: Oh, but there's more at work here than that...
jpnChrName: ──どうやら それだけでもなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
──どうやら
それだけでもなさそうだ。

engChrName: So this way leads up into the mountains...
engSearchText: So this way leads up into the mountains...
jpnChrName: 山脈に通じる崖道──だっけ。
jpnSearchText: 山脈に通じる崖道──だっけ。

engChrName: It looks very scenic, but it's still littered with monsters.
engSearchText:
It looks very scenic, but it's still littered
with monsters.
jpnChrName: ……キレイですけど やっぱり魔獣がいますね……
jpnSearchText:
……キレイですけど
やっぱり魔獣がいますね……

engChrName: If Yumé really did come up here alone...
engSearchText: If Yumé really did come up here alone...
jpnChrName: こんな所をユメちゃんが 本当に通ったとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
こんな所をユメちゃんが
本当に通ったとしたら……

engChrName: ...then we've got no time for talking. Let's get a move on.
engSearchText:
...then we've got no time for talking. Let's get a
move on.
jpnChrName: ウダウダ言っても仕方ねぇ。 とっとと登ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ウダウダ言っても仕方ねぇ。
とっとと登ってみるぞ。

engChrName: The police and the guild have promised to inform us if they learn of anything.
engSearchText:
The police and the guild have promised to inform us
if they learn of anything.
jpnChrName: 警察とギルドで何か判明すれば すぐに連絡がある段取りです。
jpnSearchText:
警察とギルドで何か判明すれば
すぐに連絡がある段取りです。

engChrName: You're still all good with helping us with this, right?
engSearchText: You're still all good with helping us with this, right?
jpnChrName: ──ジュディス、 お前さんも改めていいんだな？
jpnSearchText:
──ジュディス、
お前さんも改めていいんだな？

engChrName: Of course. If we ever need to split up to cover more ground, then the more people we have, the better.
engSearchText:
Of course. If we ever need to split up to cover more
ground, then the more people we have, the better.
jpnChrName: ええ、手分けして山道を 捜す必要があるかもしれないし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、手分けして山道を
捜す必要があるかもしれないし。

engChrName: I can pull my weight in battle if we run up against any tough monsters, too.
engSearchText:
I can pull my weight in battle if we run up against any
tough monsters, too.
jpnChrName: 面倒そうな魔獣相手でも アテにしてくれていいわよ。
jpnSearchText:
面倒そうな魔獣相手でも
アテにしてくれていいわよ。

engChrName: Heck, even if it takes me getting into costume again, that's what I'll do!
engSearchText:
Heck, even if it takes me getting into costume again,
that's what I'll do!
jpnChrName: なんだったら“あっちの方”を 改めて披露したっていいし。
jpnSearchText:
なんだったら“あっちの方”を
改めて披露したっていいし。

engChrName: Then we're countin' on you.
engSearchText: Then we're countin' on you.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そいつは頼もしいな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そいつは頼もしいな。

engChrName: Heh. Can't wait to see this ten up close.
engSearchText: Heh. Can't wait to see this ten up close.
jpnChrName: クク、そん時はせいぜい 間近で堪能させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そん時はせいぜい
間近で堪能させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: C-Can you not look at me with those lust-filled eyes?!
engSearchText:
C-Can you not look at me with those
lust-filled eyes?!
jpnChrName: よ、邪な目で見るんじゃないっ！
jpnSearchText: よ、邪な目で見るんじゃないっ！

engChrName: Let's get moving!
engSearchText: Let's get moving!
jpnChrName: とにかく行きましょう……！
jpnSearchText: とにかく行きましょう……！

engChrName: We're counting on FIO and XEROS' support, too!
engSearchText: We're counting on FIO and XEROS' support, too!
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯちゃん、ＸＥＲＯＳ君も よろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯちゃん、ＸＥＲＯＳ君も
よろしくお願いします……！

engSearchText:
Set your sensor sensitivity to maximum!
Following Yumé's trail is top priority!

jpnSearchText:
センサー感度最大！
ユメちゃんの痕跡を最優先だ。

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: リョウカイ！
jpnSearchText: リョウカイ！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Judith joined the party once more.
engSearchText: Judith joined the party once more.
jpnChrName: ジュディスが改めて仲間に入った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ジュディスが改めて仲間に入った。

engChrName: That's the last of them. But...
engSearchText: That's the last of them. But...
jpnChrName: ──クリア。 ……で、でも……
jpnSearchText:
──クリア。
……で、でも……

engChrName: Try and stay calm. We've only just started searching.
engSearchText: Try and stay calm. We've only just started searching.
jpnChrName: 落ち着きなよ。 捜し始めたばかりじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
落ち着きなよ。
捜し始めたばかりじゃないか。

engChrName: Still, there's evidence on the ground that she has been this way.
engSearchText:
Still, there's evidence on the ground that she has been
this way.

jpnSearchText:
ですが時折、ユメ様らしき
痕跡が残されていますね。

engSearchText:
Yeah. We got a bunch of tiny footprints making their
way up the mountain.

jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちっちぇえ足跡が
登って行ってる感じだな。

engChrName: ...! R-Really?!
engSearchText: ...! R-Really?!
jpnChrName: ！　そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: ！　そうなんですか……

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲＲ…ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲＲ…ＢＯＷ．

engSearchText:
Affirmative. These footprints are an exact match with
those of Yumé. XEROS has also found her scent.

jpnSearchText:
肯定、ユメノ足跡ト一致。
ＸＥＲＯＳモ匂イヲ検知。

She appears to be proceeding up the mountain in a
'skipping' state.

“すきっぷ”状態デ崖道ヲ
登ッテイッテイルト推定スル。

engSearchText: Y-You even know when she's skipping?
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事まで分かるわけ？
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな事まで分かるわけ？

engChrName: But why? This just keeps makin' less and less sense...
engSearchText: But why? This just keeps makin' less and less sense...
jpnChrName: スキップか……ますます 妙な感じになってるようだが。
jpnSearchText:
スキップか……ますます
妙な感じになってるようだが。

engChrName: It figures this would react now.
engSearchText: It figures this would react now.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱり。

engChrName: Do you think that relates to Yumé in some way?
engSearchText: Do you think that relates to Yumé in some way?
jpnChrName: な、何かユメちゃんと 関係してるんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
な、何かユメちゃんと
関係してるんでしょうか……？

engChrName: Think it's more to do with this issue, to be honest.
engSearchText: Think it's more to do with this issue, to be honest.
jpnChrName: ──いや、どっちかというと こっちの方かもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
──いや、どっちかというと
こっちの方かもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Feels like we're gettin' closer by the minute.
engSearchText: Feels like we're gettin' closer by the minute.
jpnChrName: どうやら徐々に “近付いて”来てるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら徐々に
“近付いて”来てるようだ。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: そ、それって……
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……

engChrName: So that and our kiddo acting weird could be related, huh?
engSearchText:
So that and our kiddo acting weird could be
related, huh?
jpnChrName: ハン、チビの様子が おかしくなっちまったカラクリか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、チビの様子が
おかしくなっちまったカラクリか。

engChrName: Indeed... (Could this involve the Xipha's resonance in some way...?)
engSearchText:
Indeed...
(Could this involve the Xipha's resonance in
some way...?)
jpnChrName: ええ……（可能性があるとすれば ザイファによる“共鳴”……？）
jpnSearchText:
ええ……（可能性があるとすれば
ザイファによる“共鳴”……？）
………………………………

engChrName: Y-You've kinda lost me, but this means we're going in the right direction, right?
engSearchText:
Y-You've kinda lost me, but this means we're going
in the right direction, right?
jpnChrName: ──よ、よく分からないけど 確実に近付いているって事でしょ？
jpnSearchText:
──よ、よく分からないけど
確実に近付いているって事でしょ？

engChrName: Then there's no time to waste!
engSearchText: Then there's no time to waste!
jpnChrName: だったら迷うことなんてないわ！
jpnSearchText: だったら迷うことなんてないわ！

engChrName: Yeah. You're right.
engSearchText: Yeah. You're right.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ──ああ、そうだな。

engChrName: Let's keep going!
engSearchText: Let's keep going!
jpnChrName: はい……先を急ぎましょう！
jpnSearchText: はい……先を急ぎましょう！

engChrName: Oh! There she is!
engSearchText: Oh! There she is!
jpnChrName: ！　見つけました……！
jpnSearchText: ！　見つけました……！

engChrName: Thank goodness!
engSearchText: Thank goodness!
jpnSearchText: あ………

engChrName: She looks unharmed, too. What a relief.
engSearchText: She looks unharmed, too. What a relief.
jpnChrName: よかった…… 何とか無事みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
よかった……
何とか無事みたいだね。

engChrName: She has no idea just how worried she's had us... Hmm?
engSearchText:
She has no idea just how worried she's had us...
Hmm?
jpnChrName: フフ、まったく心配かけて…… ───っ？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、まったく心配かけて……
───っ？

engChrName: That certainly looks like her, but...
engSearchText: That certainly looks like her, but...
jpnChrName: 姿は間違いなく…… ………ですが…………
jpnSearchText:
姿は間違いなく……
………ですが…………

engChrName: Something's not right.
engSearchText: Something's not right.
jpnChrName: ナニモンだ──あいつは？
jpnSearchText: ナニモンだ──あいつは？
……………………………

engChrName: La la laaa...
engSearchText: La la laaa...
jpnChrName: ふんふんふーん……
jpnSearchText: ふんふんふーん……

engChrName: I'm starting to get used to this body. We must have a high affinity after all.
engSearchText:
I'm starting to get used to this body. We must have a
high affinity after all.
jpnChrName: だいぶ慣れてきたわねー。 やっぱり相性が良いみたい。
jpnSearchText:
だいぶ慣れてきたわねー。
やっぱり相性が良いみたい。

engChrName: Hmm... Perhaps she's...
engSearchText: Hmm... Perhaps she's...
jpnChrName: ああ、もしかしてこの子って──
jpnSearchText: ああ、もしかしてこの子って──

engChrName: Stop right there!
engSearchText: Stop right there!
jpnChrName: ───待ちやがれ！
jpnSearchText: ───待ちやがれ！

engChrName: Oh! So this time you came to me instead of me coming to you, huh?
engSearchText:
Oh! So this time you came to me instead of
me coming to you, huh?
jpnChrName: あれ、アンタたちも来たんだ。
jpnSearchText: あれ、アンタたちも来たんだ。

engChrName: Yumé...?
engSearchText: Yumé...?
jpnChrName: ユメ、ちゃん……？
jpnSearchText: ユメ、ちゃん……？

engChrName: No, something about what she said makes me think...
engSearchText:
No, something about what she said makes
me think...
jpnChrName: いいえ…… ま、まさかこの喋り方は……！
jpnSearchText:
いいえ……
ま、まさかこの喋り方は……！
っ……！？

engChrName: My bad feeling was right on the mark, huh?
engSearchText: My bad feeling was right on the mark, huh?
jpnChrName: チッ……まさかと思ったが。
jpnSearchText: チッ……まさかと思ったが。

engChrName: It's you, isn't it? Mare?
engSearchText: It's you, isn't it? Mare?
jpnChrName: “お前”なのか──《メア》？
jpnSearchText: “お前”なのか──《メア》？

engChrName: Heehee... Heeheehee...
engSearchText: Heehee... Heeheehee...
jpnChrName: クスクス…… ………フフフッ………
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……
………フフフッ………

engChrName: It sure is! I'd be more surprised if you didn't figure it out after I left THAT many clues.
engSearchText:
It sure is! I'd be more surprised if you didn't figure it
out after I left THAT many clues.
jpnChrName: せいかーい！　あれだけ痕跡を 残してたら気付かれちゃうか～！
jpnSearchText:
せいかーい！　あれだけ痕跡を
残してたら気付かれちゃうか～！

engSearchText:
That's right! It's me, Mare! I'm just borrowing this
little one's body for a while.

jpnSearchText:
そう、アタシは“メア”！
この子の身体を貸してもらってるわ！

engChrName: This is my first time trying something like this, so I wasn't sure it was going to work...
engSearchText:
This is my first time trying something like this, so I

Taking a not-so-wild stab in the dark here: you're this
child's guardian of sorts?
jpnChrName: で、そちらの貴方が この子の保護者代表なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
で、そちらの貴方が
この子の保護者代表なのかな？

engChrName: I'm not going to hurt her. You're more than welcome to take her home with you.
engSearchText:
I'm not going to hurt her. You're more than welcome
to take her home with you.
jpnChrName: 別に危害を加えるつもりはないから 連れて帰るといいよ。
jpnSearchText:
別に危害を加えるつもりはないから
連れて帰るといいよ。

engChrName: I'd be happy to perform an exorcism here and now if you want me to, too.
engSearchText:
I'd be happy to perform an exorcism here and now if
you want me to, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、何だったら私が “祓って”あげてもいいけど？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何だったら私が
“祓って”あげてもいいけど？

engChrName: You see, that's another of one my specialties.
engSearchText: You see, that's another of one my specialties.
jpnChrName: 一応、そっちも得意分野だしね。
jpnSearchText: 一応、そっちも得意分野だしね。

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnSearchText: ひっ……！？

engChrName: W-Wait, please!
engSearchText: W-Wait, please!
jpnChrName: ま、待ってください……！
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってください……！

engChrName: Don't you do anything to her.
engSearchText: Don't you do anything to her.
jpnChrName: ……あなたは………
jpnSearchText: ……あなたは………

engChrName: We're fine, thanks. She's gonna need tellin' off, but we can handle that ourselves.
engSearchText:
We're fine, thanks. She's gonna need tellin' off, but
we can handle that ourselves.
jpnChrName: 必要ねえ──お仕置きは必要だが アンタに頼むつもりはねぇよ。
jpnSearchText:
必要ねえ──お仕置きは必要だが
アンタに頼むつもりはねぇよ。

engChrName: You're no ordinary chick, are you?
engSearchText: You're no ordinary chick, are you?
jpnChrName: どうやらタダ者じゃなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText: どうやらタダ者じゃなさそうだが……

engChrName: Hell, I get the feeling she's a monster among monsters.
engSearchText:
Hell, I get the feeling she's a monster
among monsters.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それどころか “化物”以上みてぇだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それどころか
“化物”以上みてぇだなァ？

engChrName: Her Eastern tachi and cutting-edge fortified suit certainly suggest as much.
engSearchText:
Her Eastern tachi and cutting-edge fortified suit
certainly suggest as much.
jpnChrName: ……東方の太刀、そして 最新式の強化スーツですか。
jpnSearchText:
……東方の太刀、そして
最新式の強化スーツですか。

engChrName: Hmm... I think I like you people.
engSearchText: Hmm... I think I like you people.
jpnChrName: うん……いいね貴方たち。
jpnSearchText: うん……いいね貴方たち。

engChrName: Oof!
engSearchText: Oof!
jpnChrName: きゃっ……
jpnSearchText: きゃっ……

engChrName: I know work can't always be fun, but I was getting real bored up here.
engSearchText:
I know work can't always be fun, but I was getting
real bored up here.
jpnChrName: お仕事だから仕方ないんだけど ちょっと退屈していた所だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
お仕事だから仕方ないんだけど
ちょっと退屈していた所だったんだ。

engChrName: What do you say to a little sparring match against me?
engSearchText:
What do you say to a little sparring match
against me?
jpnChrName: よかったら私と 手合わせしてもらえないかな？
jpnSearchText:
よかったら私と
手合わせしてもらえないかな？

engChrName: Oh, and you can all come at me at once—seriously, go for it.
engSearchText:
Oh, and you can all come at me at once—seriously,
go for it.
jpnChrName: あっ、そちらは全員で構わないよ。
jpnSearchText: あっ、そちらは全員で構わないよ。
っ……

engChrName: Heh... Sounds like fun to me.
engSearchText: Heh... Sounds like fun to me.
jpnChrName: クハハ……面白ぇ。
jpnSearchText: クハハ……面白ぇ。

engChrName: Agnès, can you look after Yumé?
engSearchText: Agnès, can you look after Yumé?
jpnChrName: ……アニエスさん、 どうかユメちゃんを。
jpnSearchText:
……アニエスさん、
どうかユメちゃんを。

engChrName: ...All right.
engSearchText: ...All right.
jpnChrName: っ……分かりました。
jpnSearchText: っ……分かりました。

engChrName: Great...
engSearchText: Great...
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: To keep it simple: I'm a spriggan, and these are my employees from Arkride Solutions over in the capital.
engSearchText:
To keep it simple: I'm a spriggan, and these are my
employees from Arkride Solutions over in the capital.
jpnChrName: 共和国首都で裏解決屋をやっている 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国首都で裏解決屋をやっている
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: I get the feelin' I've heard rumors about you already... but how about you introduce yourself?
engSearchText:
I get the feelin' I've heard rumors about you already...
but how about you introduce yourself?
jpnChrName: 東からの風の噂で耳にしちゃいるが…… 一応、名乗って貰おうか？
jpnSearchText:
東からの風の噂で耳にしちゃいるが……
一応、名乗って貰おうか？

engChrName: Sure. I don't see a problem with that.
engSearchText: Sure. I don't see a problem with that.
jpnChrName: うん、それは勿論。
jpnSearchText: うん、それは勿論。

engChrName: To also keep it simple: my name is Shizuna Rem Misurugi, and I'm second-in-command of Ikaruga.
engSearchText:
To also keep it simple: my name is Shizuna Rem
Misurugi, and I'm second-in-command of Ikaruga.
jpnChrName: 侍衆《斑鳩（いかるが）》の副長を務める、 シズナ・レム・ミスルギという者だよ。
jpnSearchText:
侍衆《斑鳩（いかるが）》の副長を務める、
シズナ・レム・ミスルギという者だよ。

engChrName: I'm also part of the Black God One Blade school. So, you all ready for a fight?
engSearchText:
I'm also part of the Black God One Blade school.
So, you all ready for a fight?
jpnChrName: 《黒神一刀（こくしんいっとう）流》が使い手として 一手、お相手願おうかな？
jpnSearchText:
《黒神一刀（こくしんいっとう）流》が使い手として
一手、お相手願おうかな？

engChrName: As I feared!
engSearchText: As I feared!
jpnChrName: やはり……！
jpnSearchText: やはり……！

engChrName: W-Wait a second! I don't even know what's happening anymore!
engSearchText:
W-Wait a second! I don't even know what's
happening anymore!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待って！ 全然付いていけないんだけど！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと待って！
全然付いていけないんだけど！？

engChrName: I-I'm lost. What's this about an Ikaruga and a Black God now?
engSearchText:
I-I'm lost. What's this about an Ikaruga and a Black
God now?
jpnChrName: な、なんなのよ、その斑鳩とか 黒神なんちゃら流って……！？
jpnSearchText:
な、なんなのよ、その斑鳩とか
黒神なんちゃら流って……！？

engChrName: ...I heard about them back home!
engSearchText: ...I heard about them back home!
jpnChrName: ッ…… 里で聞いたことがあります！
jpnSearchText:
ッ……
里で聞いたことがあります！

engChrName: Heh, I've never heard of Black God, but that doesn't mean this is the first I've heard of a One Blade school!
engSearchText:
Heh, I've never heard of Black God, but that doesn't
mean this is the first I've heard of a One
Blade school!
jpnChrName: クク、黒神とやらはともかく 一刀流ってのは聞いてるぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
クク、黒神とやらはともかく
一刀流ってのは聞いてるぜ……！

engChrName: There are countless jaegers competing in the wastelands of the East.
engSearchText:
There are countless jaegers competing in the
wastelands of the East.
jpnChrName: ……荒廃する大陸東部で 日々、鎬を削る数多の猟兵団。
jpnSearchText:
……荒廃する大陸東部で
日々、鎬を削る数多の猟兵団。

engChrName: But there's one group known to stand above all of the rest.
engSearchText:
But there's one group known to stand above all of
the rest.
jpnChrName: その中でも“最強”と謳われる、 太刀と忍びの使い手どもの武装集団──
jpnSearchText:
その中でも“最強”と謳われる、
太刀と忍びの使い手どもの武装集団──

engChrName: Ikaruga, a SSS-level jaeger corps led by the Divine Blade of Silver!
engSearchText:
Ikaruga, a SSS-level jaeger corps led by the Divine
Blade of Silver!
jpnChrName: ＳＳＳ級猟兵団《斑鳩》を率いる 《白銀（しろがね）の剣聖》ってヤツだ……！！
jpnSearchText:
ＳＳＳ級猟兵団《斑鳩》を率いる
《白銀（しろがね）の剣聖》ってヤツだ……！！

engChrName: Heh. Well, you've got the spirit. Now to see if you've got the strength!
engSearchText:
Heh. Well, you've got the spirit. Now to see if you've
got the strength!
jpnChrName: フフ、いい気当たりだ。 ──それではいざ、尋常に勝負！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いい気当たりだ。
──それではいざ、尋常に勝負！

engChrName: Hahaha! Holy hell!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Holy hell!
jpnChrName: クハハ、マジかよ……！
jpnSearchText: クハハ、マジかよ……！

engChrName: If we can just keep hanging in there...
engSearchText: If we can just keep hanging in there...
jpnChrName: でも、このまま凌げれば……！
jpnSearchText: でも、このまま凌げれば……！

engChrName: Wha...?! I think I'm at my limit here!
engSearchText: Wha...?! I think I'm at my limit here!
jpnChrName: ちょ、いつまでやらなくちゃ いけないわけ……！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、いつまでやらなくちゃ
いけないわけ……！？

engChrName: Good, good. I'm genuinely impressed.
engSearchText: Good, good. I'm genuinely impressed.
jpnChrName: うん──すごく良い感じだ。
jpnSearchText: うん──すごく良い感じだ。

engChrName: I know my master warned me otherwise, but I'd be remiss as a Divine Blade if I didn't pay respect to your strength.
engSearchText:
I know my master warned me otherwise, but I'd be
remiss as a Divine Blade if I didn't pay respect to
your strength.
jpnChrName: 老師（せんせい）からの戒めはあるけど…… 剣聖として敬意を表させてもらおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
老師（せんせい）からの戒めはあるけど……
剣聖として敬意を表させてもらおうかな。

engChrName: Ohhhhh...
engSearchText: Ohhhhh...
jpnChrName: こおおおおおっ……
jpnSearchText: こおおおおおっ……

engChrName: Crap...
engSearchText: Crap...
jpnSearchText: まさか──……！？

engChrName: Spirit Unification!
engSearchText: Spirit Unification!
jpnChrName: 神 氣 合 一 ！
jpnSearchText: 神 氣 合 一 ！
あ──………

engChrName: Th-That's the famous...
engSearchText: Th-That's the famous...
jpnChrName: あ、あれはかの有名な……！
jpnSearchText: あ、あれはかの有名な……！

engChrName: That's the master technique used by that new Divine Blade from the Empire?!
engSearchText:
That's the master technique used by that new Divine
Blade from the Empire?!
jpnChrName: 帝国の新米剣聖ってのが 使いやがるっつう絶招（ぜっしょう）かよ！？
jpnSearchText:
帝国の新米剣聖ってのが
使いやがるっつう絶招（ぜっしょう）かよ！？

engChrName: Oh, you know him? He's started aiming to perfect his own potential, I believe.
engSearchText:
Oh, you know him? He's started aiming to perfect his
own potential, I believe.
jpnChrName: うん、彼もまた独自の高みを 目指し始めているみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うん、彼もまた独自の高みを
目指し始めているみたいだけど。

engChrName: This is just my best attempt at replicating his technique.
engSearchText:
This is just my best attempt at replicating
his technique.
jpnChrName: これは以前、彼が披露したものを 私なりに再現してみた紛い物かな。
jpnSearchText:
これは以前、彼が披露したものを
私なりに再現してみた紛い物かな。

engChrName: Still, I do find it pretty comfortable to use. Now, will this be enough to get you to start going for broke?
engSearchText:
Still, I do find it pretty comfortable to use. Now, will
this be enough to get you to start going for broke?
jpnChrName: でも、割と使い勝手がよくてね。 ──これなら奥の手を出してくれるかな？
jpnSearchText:
でも、割と使い勝手がよくてね。
──これなら奥の手を出してくれるかな？
ッ……！？

engChrName: Sh-She can't...
engSearchText: Sh-She can't...
jpnChrName: ま、まさか……
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか……

engChrName: Wh-What IS this woman?
engSearchText: Wh-What IS this woman?
jpnChrName: な、なんなのよコイツ……
jpnSearchText: な、なんなのよコイツ……

engChrName: (That's gotta be the Unclouded Eye lettin' her see things for what they truly are.)
engSearchText:
(That's gotta be the Unclouded Eye lettin' her see
things for what they truly are.)
jpnChrName: （本質直観による見抜き──   《観の眼》ってヤツか……！）
jpnSearchText:
（本質直観による見抜き──
《観の眼》ってヤツか……！）

engChrName: Oho. I'm surprised you've heard of it.
engSearchText: Oho. I'm surprised you've heard of it.
jpnChrName: へえ、よく知ってるね？
jpnSearchText: へえ、よく知ってるね？

engChrName: Get outta my head!
engSearchText: Get outta my head!
jpnChrName: って読むんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: って読むんじゃねえ！

engChrName: Bah...
engSearchText: Bah...
jpnChrName: チイッ……！
jpnSearchText: チイッ……！

engChrName: D-Do we even stand a chance?
engSearchText: D-Do we even stand a chance?
jpnChrName: む、無茶苦茶なんですけど……
jpnSearchText: む、無茶苦茶なんですけど……

engChrName: Ugh. I cannot believe you people...
engSearchText: Ugh. I cannot believe you people...
jpnChrName: まったくどいつもこいつも……
jpnSearchText: まったくどいつもこいつも……
……？

engChrName: Wh-What are you doing?
engSearchText: Wh-What are you doing?
jpnChrName: ジュ、ジュディスさん……？
jpnSearchText: ジュ、ジュディスさん……？

engChrName: GET A GRIP, ALREADY!
engSearchText: GET A GRIP, ALREADY!
jpnChrName: いい加減にしなさああああい！！！
jpnSearchText: いい加減にしなさああああい！！！

engChrName: Have you forgotten why we're even here?!
engSearchText: Have you forgotten why we're even here?!
jpnChrName: 目的を見失ってんじゃないわよ！
jpnSearchText: 目的を見失ってんじゃないわよ！

engChrName: Our top priority is rescuing Yumé!
engSearchText: Our top priority is rescuing Yumé!
jpnChrName: こっちの最優先事項は その子の安全確保でしょうが！？
jpnSearchText:
こっちの最優先事項は
その子の安全確保でしょうが！？

engChrName: And since she's probably exhausted from having her body borrowed since last night, she needs to rest!
engSearchText:
And since she's probably exhausted from having her
body borrowed since last night, she needs to rest!
jpnChrName: 夜中から身体を使われてるんだから 休ませるのが先でしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
夜中から身体を使われてるんだから
休ませるのが先でしょう！？

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: あっ……！
jpnSearchText: あっ……！

engChrName: ...A valid point.
engSearchText: ...A valid point.
jpnChrName: ………確かに。
jpnSearchText: ………確かに。

engChrName: And you! I got a bone to pick with you!
engSearchText: And you! I got a bone to pick with you!
jpnChrName: アンタもアンタよ！
jpnSearchText: アンタもアンタよ！

engChrName: You might be really strong and perceptive, but if you're not out to kill us, maybe try reading the room before our minds!
engSearchText:
You might be really strong and perceptive, but if
you're not out to kill us, maybe try reading the room
before our minds!
jpnChrName: 凄まじい腕に大した洞察力だけど 殺意がないなら空気の方も読みなさい！
jpnSearchText:
凄まじい腕に大した洞察力だけど
殺意がないなら空気の方も読みなさい！

engChrName: 'Divine Blade'? That's sure an awesome-sounding title that you're totally not living up to right now.
engSearchText:
'Divine Blade'? That's sure an awesome-sounding
title that you're totally not living up to right now.
jpnChrName: 剣聖？　どれほど凄いか知らないけど 完全に名前倒れなんじゃないの！？
jpnSearchText:
剣聖？　どれほど凄いか知らないけど
完全に名前倒れなんじゃないの！？

engChrName: ...Well, you got me there.
engSearchText: ...Well, you got me there.
jpnChrName: ……うん、返す言葉もないな。
jpnSearchText: ……うん、返す言葉もないな。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnSearchText: ……ぁ…………
…………………………

engChrName: I'd written you off as some strange woman with some wackadoo fashion sense, but you really hit the nail on the head.
engSearchText:
I'd written you off as some strange woman with
some wackadoo fashion sense, but you really hit
the nail on the head.
jpnChrName: 破廉恥な格好をした変な人と思ったけど 貴女の言うことはもっともだ。
jpnSearchText:
破廉恥な格好をした変な人と思ったけど
貴女の言うことはもっともだ。

engChrName: That's some presence. Do you make a living on the stage or something?
engSearchText:
That's some presence. Do you make a living on the
stage or something?
jpnChrName: ふふ、でも今の一喝、 舞台かなにかをやってる人なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、でも今の一喝、
舞台かなにかをやってる人なのかな？

engChrName: Well, it just so happens that I do—and who the hell are you calling strange with a wackadoo fashion sense?!
engSearchText:
Well, it just so happens that I do—and who the hell
are you calling strange with a wackadoo
fashion sense?!
jpnChrName: ふう……お察しの通りだけど。 ──って誰がハレンチで変な人よっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ふう……お察しの通りだけど。
──って誰がハレンチで変な人よっ！？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: え、えと……
jpnSearchText: え、えと……

engChrName: Are we good to wrap this up now?
engSearchText: Are we good to wrap this up now?
jpnChrName: ……なんだこのグダグダは。
jpnSearchText: ……なんだこのグダグダは。

engChrName: Looks like we're done fightin' either way.
engSearchText: Looks like we're done fightin' either way.
jpnChrName: ──ま、なんにせよ、 ここらで手打ちでいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、なんにせよ、
ここらで手打ちでいいだろう。

engChrName: We only came here for a few days of R&R, so we're off to the capital tomorrow.
engSearchText:
We only came here for a few days of R&R, so we're
off to the capital tomorrow.
jpnChrName: こっちは二泊三日の慰安旅行、 明日には首都に戻るだけのメンツだ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちは二泊三日の慰安旅行、
明日には首都に戻るだけのメンツだ。

engChrName: That means we don't care about you and your guys— or what you're doing in the middle of the mountains.
engSearchText:
That means we don't care about you and your guys—
or what you're doing in the middle of the mountains.
jpnChrName: アンタらに興味はない── なんでこんな山奥にいるかも含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらに興味はない──
なんでこんな山奥にいるかも含めてな。

engChrName: Sounds like we're in a good place, then.
engSearchText: Sounds like we're in a good place, then.
jpnChrName: うん、それが賢明だね。
jpnSearchText: うん、それが賢明だね。

engChrName: We're not here to fight against tourists from Longlai.
engSearchText: We're not here to fight against tourists from Longlai.
jpnChrName: 我らが相手をするのは龍來の客にあらず。
jpnSearchText: 我らが相手をするのは龍來の客にあらず。

engChrName: Our enemies are intruders who violate the soil of the Kunlun Mountains with ill intent.
engSearchText:
Our enemies are intruders who violate the soil of the
Kunlun Mountains with ill intent.
jpnChrName: 悪意や脅威をもって《崑崙》の地に 足を踏み入れんとする闖入者のみだ。
jpnSearchText:
悪意や脅威をもって《崑崙》の地に
足を踏み入れんとする闖入者のみだ。

engChrName: Like our friend over there, for instance.
engSearchText: Like our friend over there, for instance.
jpnChrName: ──たとえば、 そちらの御仁のようにね。
jpnSearchText:
──たとえば、
そちらの御仁のようにね。
……！？

engChrName: Damn. Didn't think anyone would notice me.
engSearchText: Damn. Didn't think anyone would notice me.
jpnChrName: やれやれ──気付いてたのかよ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ──気付いてたのかよ。

engChrName: I was gonna murder you all if the opportunity came knockin', but I guess it's not coming.
engSearchText:
I was gonna murder you all if the opportunity came
knockin', but I guess it's not coming.
jpnChrName: ハハ、隙を見せたら皆殺しに してやろうと思ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、隙を見せたら皆殺しに
してやろうと思ったんだが。

engChrName: ...?! (What a murderous aura...)
engSearchText:
...?!
(What a murderous aura...)
jpnSearchText: ！？（この殺気……！）

engChrName: That isn't a shard camouflage!
engSearchText: That isn't a shard camouflage!
jpnChrName: シャードの迷彩ではない……！？
jpnSearchText: シャードの迷彩ではない……！？

engChrName: Aaahh!
engSearchText: Aaahh!
jpnChrName: うわあああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うわあああっ……！？

engChrName: GRR...
engSearchText: GRR...
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲＲＲＲＲＲ……！
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲＲＲＲＲＲ……！

engChrName: Not good...
engSearchText: Not good...
jpnChrName: コ、コイツは……
jpnSearchText: コ、コイツは……

engChrName: Easy, now. I ain't lookin' for a fight.
engSearchText: Easy, now. I ain't lookin' for a fight.
jpnChrName: まあ、そう構えんなって。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そう構えんなって。

engChrName: I'll admit, I would've taken an opening if I saw one, but I got to see a hell of a fight, so I'd say I'm satisfied.
engSearchText:
I'll admit, I would've taken an opening if I saw one,
but I got to see a hell of a fight, so I'd say
I'm satisfied.
jpnChrName: あわよくばを狙ったんだが、 良い勝負を見せてもらっちまったしな。
jpnSearchText:
あわよくばを狙ったんだが、
良い勝負を見せてもらっちまったしな。

engChrName: Heh. Almost can't wait until we meet next.
engSearchText: Heh. Almost can't wait until we meet next.
jpnChrName: クク…… “次”は存分に愉しめるってモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
“次”は存分に愉しめるってモンだぜ。

engChrName: Oh? That halberd and armor of yours are clearly something special.
engSearchText:
Oh? That halberd and armor of yours are clearly
something special.
jpnChrName: へえ……？ その斧槍に甲冑はひょっとして。
jpnSearchText:
へえ……？
その斧槍に甲冑はひょっとして。

engChrName: Yeah. I was thinkin' they're bound to be artifacts.
engSearchText: Yeah. I was thinkin' they're bound to be artifacts.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、 どちらも古代遺物（アーティファクト）だろう。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、
どちらも古代遺物（アーティファクト）だろう。

engChrName: You son of a bitch. You're one of them, aren't you?
engSearchText: You son of a bitch. You're one of them, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ……てめえ、 ひょっとしなくても……
jpnSearchText:
……てめえ、
ひょっとしなくても……

engChrName: W-Wait... Are you one of the people who attacked Aida?!
engSearchText:
W-Wait... Are you one of the people who
attacked Aida?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさか…… アイーダさんたちを襲った……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさか……
アイーダさんたちを襲った……

engChrName: Man—that Flameeater was a fine woman. Real shame she got snuffed out like that.
engSearchText:
Man—that Flameeater was a fine woman.
Real shame she got snuffed out like that.
jpnChrName: ああ、《火喰鳥》だったか？ イイ女だったから勿体なかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《火喰鳥》だったか？
イイ女だったから勿体なかったぜ。

engChrName: I'm the overseer of the Garden of Rust, Arioch the Eradicator.
engSearchText:
I'm the overseer of the Garden of Rust, Arioch
the Eradicator.
jpnChrName: 庭園（ガーデン）が一、《錆（ラスト）》の管理人をしている 《鏖殺》のアリオッチってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
庭園（ガーデン）が一、《錆（ラスト）》の管理人をしている
《鏖殺》のアリオッチってモンだ。

engChrName: I'm also workin' with Almata's Dantès right now, as I'm sure you already caught on to.
engSearchText:
I'm also workin' with Almata's Dantès right now, as
I'm sure you already caught on to.
jpnChrName: 一応、アルマータの ジェラールの旦那に協力している。
jpnSearchText:
一応、アルマータの
ジェラールの旦那に協力している。

engChrName: I hear you guys took REAL good care of Melchior and Olympia, huh?
engSearchText:
I hear you guys took REAL good care of Melchior
and Olympia, huh?
jpnChrName: 聞いてるぜ──メルキオルと オランピアが世話になったらしいな？
jpnSearchText:
聞いてるぜ──メルキオルと
オランピアが世話になったらしいな？

engChrName: Eek...
engSearchText: Eek...
jpnChrName: ひっ………
jpnSearchText: ひっ………

engChrName: Wh-Why are you smiling at us like that?!
engSearchText: Wh-Why are you smiling at us like that?!
jpnChrName: な、なんでそんな笑顔で……
jpnSearchText: な、なんでそんな笑顔で……

engChrName: C'mon. I already said the fight can wait until next time.
engSearchText:
C'mon. I already said the fight can wait until
next time.
jpnChrName: あー…… だから“次”って言ってんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
あー……
だから“次”って言ってんだろ？

engChrName: Especially since it looks like we got ourselves a few more guests.
engSearchText:
Especially since it looks like we got ourselves a few
more guests.
jpnChrName: そうこうするうちに 来ちまったみたいだしなァ。
jpnSearchText:
そうこうするうちに
来ちまったみたいだしなァ。

engChrName: Heehee. They're finally back.
engSearchText: Heehee. They're finally back.
jpnChrName: フフ、戻ったか。
jpnSearchText: フフ、戻ったか。

engChrName: It's the other warriors of Ikaruga...
engSearchText: It's the other warriors of Ikaruga...
jpnChrName: 斑鳩の兵（つわもの）がた……
jpnSearchText: 斑鳩の兵（つわもの）がた……

engChrName: A real gathering of powerhouses.
engSearchText: A real gathering of powerhouses.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、“最強”かよ。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど、“最強”かよ。

engChrName: You're all from the Rougetsu school, yeah? Nice of you to drop by.
engSearchText:
You're all from the Rougetsu school, yeah? Nice of
you to drop by.
jpnChrName: クク……《朧月（ろうげつ）流》だったか。 わざわざの挨拶、痛み入るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……《朧月（ろうげつ）流》だったか。
わざわざの挨拶、痛み入るぜ。

engChrName: Well, time to get goin'. See you around, spriggan— and you, too, Silverblade.
engSearchText:
Well, time to get goin'. See you around, spriggan—
and you, too, Silverblade.
jpnChrName: さーて、そんじゃあな。 白銀（しろがね）の姫に、裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
さーて、そんじゃあな。
白銀（しろがね）の姫に、裏解決屋。

engChrName: Like I said, the real fun'll begin at our next play date...
engSearchText:
Like I said, the real fun'll begin at our next
play date...
jpnChrName: 今回は挨拶──さっきも言ったが “次”を愉しみにさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
今回は挨拶──さっきも言ったが
“次”を愉しみにさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: In a joyous carnival of blood and violence the likes of which the world has never seen.
engSearchText:
In a joyous carnival of blood and violence the likes of
which the world has never seen.
jpnChrName: 噎（む）せ返る血の匂いと暴力に酔いしれる、 とっておきの《謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）》でな。
jpnSearchText:
噎（む）せ返る血の匂いと暴力に酔いしれる、
とっておきの《謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）》でな。

engChrName: Wait a damn second!
engSearchText: Wait a damn second!
jpnChrName: ！　待てやコラ──！
jpnSearchText: ！　待てやコラ──！

engChrName: Oh, before I go. I heard you spittin' fire earlier, and it was enough to make me hesitate on killin' you all.
engSearchText:
Oh, before I go. I heard you spittin' fire earlier, and it
was enough to make me hesitate on killin' you all.
jpnChrName: そうそう、さっきの啖呵は痺れたぜ。 ──鏖殺（みなごろし）を躊躇うくらいにはな。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、さっきの啖呵は痺れたぜ。
──鏖殺（みなごろし）を躊躇うくらいにはな。
ッ……！？

engChrName: Heh. Crossing fingers you'll take part in the carnival, too.
engSearchText:
Heh. Crossing fingers you'll take part in the
carnival, too.
jpnChrName: クク……出来ればアンタにも 祭りに参加してもらいたいもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……出来ればアンタにも
祭りに参加してもらいたいもんだぜ。

engChrName: Well, that's not a kind of teleportation I'm used to seeing.
engSearchText:
Well, that's not a kind of teleportation I'm used
to seeing.
jpnChrName: 遁甲術（とんこうじゅつ）じゃないね。
jpnSearchText: 遁甲術（とんこうじゅつ）じゃないね。

engChrName: I would assume he used the power of his artifacts— which I suspect are...
engSearchText:
I would assume he used the power of his artifacts—
which I suspect are...
jpnChrName: 遺物の力でありましょう。 そしてあの斧槍と甲冑……
jpnSearchText:
遺物の力でありましょう。
そしてあの斧槍と甲冑……

engChrName: Yeah. He might just be the one we were warned about.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He might just be the one we were
warned about.
jpnChrName: うん、前にオババが言ってた “あの者”かもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
うん、前にオババが言ってた
“あの者”かもしれない。

engChrName: Ugh. I could really do without fans like him...
engSearchText: Ugh. I could really do without fans like him...
jpnChrName: ……冗談キツいわよ…… あんなファン要らないんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
……冗談キツいわよ……
あんなファン要らないんですけど……

engChrName: I'm sure...
engSearchText: I'm sure...
jpnChrName: まあ、そうだろうね……
jpnSearchText: まあ、そうだろうね……

engChrName: Okay. Looks like we really are done with fightin' for today.
engSearchText:
Okay. Looks like we really are done with fightin'
for today.
jpnChrName: まあいい──とにかく 今度こそ手打ちでよさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい──とにかく
今度こそ手打ちでよさそうだ。

engChrName: And not a moment too soon—I'm about to crash. So if you could hurry up and get the hell outta here, that'd be great.
engSearchText:
And not a moment too soon—I'm about to crash.
So if you could hurry up and get the hell outta here,
that'd be great.
jpnChrName: こっちは疲れててな…… 行くならとっとと行ってくれねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
こっちは疲れててな……
行くならとっとと行ってくれねぇか？

engChrName: Such impudence.
engSearchText: Such impudence.
jpnChrName: ……無礼な。
jpnSearchText: ……無礼な。

engChrName: No one speaks to our princess—
engSearchText: No one speaks to our princess—
jpnChrName: 姫様にその口の利きよう──
jpnSearchText: 姫様にその口の利きよう──

engChrName: Sure thing, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Sure thing, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──了解したよ、アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText: ──了解したよ、アークライド所長。

engChrName: Or is it fine if I call you Van?
engSearchText: Or is it fine if I call you Van?
jpnChrName: ああ、折角だし ヴァンと呼んでもいいかな？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、折角だし
ヴァンと呼んでもいいかな？

engChrName: ...I mean, if you want.
engSearchText: ...I mean, if you want.
jpnChrName: ……いや、別にいいけどよ。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、別にいいけどよ。

engChrName: Excellent. It was nice meeting the rest of you, too.
engSearchText: Excellent. It was nice meeting the rest of you, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それ以外も見知りおきを。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それ以外も見知りおきを。

engChrName: Well, then, until next time. Hope you enjoy the rest of your stay.
engSearchText:
Well, then, until next time. Hope you enjoy the rest
of your stay.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、また。 どうか残りの滞在も楽しんでね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、また。
どうか残りの滞在も楽しんでね。

engChrName: The monsters on your path back have been slain and will not bother you. Farewell.
engSearchText:
The monsters on your path back have been slain and
will not bother you. Farewell.
jpnChrName: 帰路の魔獣は片付けた。 安心して帰られよ──御免。
jpnSearchText:
帰路の魔獣は片付けた。
安心して帰られよ──御免。

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnSearchText: ……えと………

engChrName: I can't even bring myself to comment...
engSearchText: I can't even bring myself to comment...
jpnChrName: なんつーか…… 突っ込む気も失せたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんつーか……
突っ込む気も失せたぜ。

engChrName: Regardless, now we can finally get to what we came here for.
engSearchText:
Regardless, now we can finally get to what we came
here for.
jpnChrName: ですが……そもそもの “本題”がありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……そもそもの
“本題”がありましたね。

engChrName: Uhh... I... Okay! Okay, I get it!
engSearchText: Uhh... I... Okay! Okay, I get it!
jpnChrName: う……その…… ああもう、分かってるわよ！
jpnSearchText:
う……その……
ああもう、分かってるわよ！

engChrName: I'm sorry, okay? This was all my fault!
engSearchText: I'm sorry, okay? This was all my fault!
jpnChrName: ──悪かったわね！ 全部、アタシのせいって認めるわよ！
jpnSearchText:
──悪かったわね！
全部、アタシのせいって認めるわよ！

engChrName: It's all because of me you almost had to fight a bunch of really dangerous people!
engSearchText:
It's all because of me you almost had to fight a bunch
of really dangerous people!
jpnChrName: あんなとんでもない連中と やり合う羽目になりそうだったし！
jpnSearchText:
あんなとんでもない連中と
やり合う羽目になりそうだったし！

engChrName: I almost put this little one in danger, too...
engSearchText: I almost put this little one in danger, too...
jpnChrName: ……その、この子を 危険な目に遭わせちゃったのも……
jpnSearchText:
……その、この子を
危険な目に遭わせちゃったのも……

engChrName: Look who's being so sincere all of a sudden.
engSearchText: Look who's being so sincere all of a sudden.
jpnChrName: うーん、意外と殊勝だなぁ……
jpnSearchText: うーん、意外と殊勝だなぁ……

engChrName: Though I think she's done too much to get away with just a 'sorry'...
engSearchText:
Though I think she's done too much to get away with
just a 'sorry'...
jpnChrName: ……謝ってすむ話じゃ ないような気もしますけど……
jpnSearchText:
……謝ってすむ話じゃ
ないような気もしますけど……

engChrName: We're not even the ones you need to apologize to.
engSearchText: We're not even the ones you need to apologize to.
jpnChrName: そうですね……それに 私たちに謝る必要はありません。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……それに
私たちに謝る必要はありません。

engChrName: That said, we can tell that you didn't deliberately set out to cause trouble.
engSearchText:
That said, we can tell that you didn't deliberately
set out to cause trouble.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんの身体を借りて 色々なことをしてみたこと……
jpnSearchText:
ユメちゃんの身体を借りて
色々なことをしてみたこと……

engChrName: You just wanted to know more about the world and did it without thinking, didn't you?
engSearchText:
You just wanted to know more about the world and
did it without thinking, didn't you?
jpnChrName: きっと、メアちゃん自身が 知りたくて“つい”なんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
きっと、メアちゃん自身が
知りたくて“つい”なんですよね？

engChrName: W-Well...
engSearchText: W-Well...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……
…………………………………
あ……

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ………

engChrName: I see now.
engSearchText: I see now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどね。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどね。

engChrName: Heehee. Still, try not to forget the trouble that you caused Yumé.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Still, try not to forget the trouble that you
caused Yumé.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、でもユメちゃんに悪かったという 気持ちだけは忘れないでください。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、でもユメちゃんに悪かったという
気持ちだけは忘れないでください。

engChrName: ...That works for you, too, right, Van?
engSearchText: ...That works for you, too, right, Van?
jpnChrName: ……そのくらいですよね、ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ……そのくらいですよね、ヴァンさん？

engChrName: Sure does.
engSearchText: Sure does.
jpnChrName: ああ──そんなトコだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──そんなトコだろ。

engChrName: Oh, and don't just up and ditch my Xipha outta nowhere. I had to use another holo, y'know.
engSearchText:
Oh, and don't just up and ditch my Xipha
outta nowhere. I had to use another holo, y'know.
jpnChrName: あと勝手にザイファから居なくなんじゃねえ。 他のホロウを使う羽目になったじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
あと勝手にザイファから居なくなんじゃねえ。
他のホロウを使う羽目になったじゃねえか。

engChrName: H-How could you do that?! I'm the only one allowed to—
engSearchText:
H-How could you do that?! I'm the only one allowed
to—
jpnChrName: ちょ、なに勝手に……！ アンタのサポートはアタシの……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、なに勝手に……！
アンタのサポートはアタシの……！

engChrName: ...Oh, who am I kidding? I can't complain when it was my fault.
engSearchText:
...Oh, who am I kidding? I can't complain when it
was my fault.
jpnChrName: ──って、それもアタシが原因か。
jpnSearchText: ──って、それもアタシが原因か。

engChrName: Ugh, fine! I get it! I know!
engSearchText: Ugh, fine! I get it! I know!
jpnChrName: ああもう── とにかく諸々分かったってば！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう──
とにかく諸々分かったってば！

engChrName: I'll give this body back now. Just tell her sorry for me when you get a chance!
engSearchText:
I'll give this body back now. Just tell her sorry for me
when you get a chance!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ身体を返すわよ！ 戻ったらこの子に謝っといて頂戴！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ身体を返すわよ！
戻ったらこの子に謝っといて頂戴！
あ……

engChrName: Mare...
engSearchText: Mare...
jpnChrName: メアちゃん……
jpnSearchText: メアちゃん……

engChrName: It really does seem like she used the Resonance Phenomenon in some way...
engSearchText:
It really does seem like she used the Resonance
Phenomenon in some way...
jpnChrName: （うーん、やっぱり共鳴現象を   何らかの形で利用して……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、やっぱり共鳴現象を
何らかの形で利用して……）

engChrName: But considering she was able to operate Yumé's body remotely, she must be using orbal waves...or septium veins, even?
engSearchText:
But considering she was able to operate Yumé's body
remotely, she must be using orbal waves...or septium
veins, even?
jpnChrName: （遠隔状態でも動いていたという事は   導力波や、七耀脈そのものを……？）
jpnSearchText:
（遠隔状態でも動いていたという事は
導力波や、七耀脈そのものを……？）

engChrName: Oh—one last thing before you go.
engSearchText: Oh—one last thing before you go.
jpnChrName: そうだ、最後に聞かせろ。
jpnSearchText: そうだ、最後に聞かせろ。

engChrName: We get that you wanted to try a bunch of different things...but why'd you come all the way up here?
engSearchText:
We get that you wanted to try a bunch of different
things...but why'd you come all the way up here?
jpnChrName: 色々やってみたかったのは分かったが…… ──こっちの方まで来た理由はなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
色々やってみたかったのは分かったが……
──こっちの方まで来た理由はなんだ？

engChrName: Oh. Right...
engSearchText: Oh. Right...
jpnChrName: ああ………
jpnSearchText: ああ………

engChrName: It's because further up the mountains I sensed ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍.
engSearchText:
It's because further up the mountains I
sensed ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍.
jpnChrName: こっちの方……というか更に奥地に ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍の気配を感じたからよ……
jpnSearchText:
こっちの方……というか更に奥地に
㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍の気配を感じたからよ……

engChrName: That might be something to keep in mind going forward.
engSearchText:
That might be something to keep in mind
going forward.
jpnChrName: ……ま、いずれ気に掛けた方がいいわね……
jpnSearchText: ……ま、いずれ気に掛けた方がいいわね……

engChrName: Maybe after the activation of ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍...
engSearchText: Maybe after the activation of ㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍...
jpnSearchText: ………㌍㌫㌻㍊㌫㌻㍊㍍が起動した後にでも………

engChrName: Rebooting holo system. Holo MK-ESV004 Mare has been restored.
engSearchText:
Rebooting holo system. Holo MK-ESV004 Mare has
been restored.
jpnChrName: ホロウシステム再起動── ＭＫ－ＥＳＶ００４《ＭＡＲＥ》が復旧しました。
jpnSearchText:
ホロウシステム再起動──
ＭＫ－ＥＳＶ００４《ＭＡＲＥ》が復旧しました。

engChrName: Just had to tease us one last time before she went back, huh?
engSearchText:
Just had to tease us one last time before she went
back, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ…… また思わせぶりなことを。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
また思わせぶりなことを。

engChrName: I don't understand why we couldn't hear some of what she was saying...
engSearchText:
I don't understand why we couldn't hear some of
what she was saying...
jpnChrName: また……聞こえているのに 聞き取れない言葉がありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
また……聞こえているのに
聞き取れない言葉がありましたね。

engChrName: Yeah. What was that about? That really threw me for a loop!
engSearchText:
Yeah. What was that about? That really threw me for
a loop!
jpnChrName: って、なんなのアレ？ 今更ながら気になるんだけど！
jpnSearchText:
って、なんなのアレ？
今更ながら気になるんだけど！

engChrName: We know no more than you do, unfortunately.
engSearchText: We know no more than you do, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: まあ、僕たちも同じだから 気にするだけムダだと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、僕たちも同じだから
気にするだけムダだと思うよ。

engChrName: Mmm...
engSearchText: Mmm...
jpnSearchText: んん～……？

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnSearchText: あ……

engChrName: Yumé!
engSearchText: Yumé!
jpnChrName: ユメちゃん……！
jpnSearchText: ユメちゃん……！

engChrName: *yaaawn* Oh! Morning, everybody!
engSearchText: *yaaawn* Oh! Morning, everybody!
jpnChrName: ふわああああああっ…… ──あれっ、みんなおはよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
ふわああああああっ……
──あれっ、みんなおはよ～！！

engChrName: You feeling pooped at all, kiddo?
engSearchText: You feeling pooped at all, kiddo?
jpnChrName: っておいチビ…… 疲れたりしてねぇのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
っておいチビ……
疲れたりしてねぇのかよ？

engChrName: O-Or hungry? Do you hurt anywhere?
engSearchText: O-Or hungry? Do you hurt anywhere?
jpnChrName: お、お腹空いたり、 体が痛かったりとかは……？
jpnSearchText:
お、お腹空いたり、
体が痛かったりとかは……？

engChrName: Mmm... Nope. I feel fine... Wait. But why are we outside?!
engSearchText:
Mmm... Nope. I feel fine... Wait. But why are
we outside?!
jpnChrName: んー、ベツになんともないけどー？ ──ってどうしておソトにいるの～！？
jpnSearchText:
んー、ベツになんともないけどー？
──ってどうしておソトにいるの～！？

engChrName: Woooow! It's so pretty out here!
engSearchText: Woooow! It's so pretty out here!
jpnChrName: うわああああっ、キレー～！
jpnSearchText: うわああああっ、キレー～！

engChrName: Oh! XEROS and FIO are here, too!
engSearchText: Oh! XEROS and FIO are here, too!
jpnChrName: あっ！ ＸＥＲＯＳにＦＩＯもいるんだー！？
jpnSearchText:
あっ！
ＸＥＲＯＳにＦＩＯもいるんだー！？

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷＯＷ！

engChrName: Good morning, Yumé.
engSearchText: Good morning, Yumé.
jpnChrName: ユメ、オハヨウ。
jpnSearchText: ユメ、オハヨウ。

engChrName: Ahaha... Well, shall we get back to Longlai?
engSearchText: Ahaha... Well, shall we get back to Longlai?
jpnChrName: あはは…… とにかく町に戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
とにかく町に戻りましょうか。

engChrName: That sounds like a plan to me. We should make sure everyone knows we found her first thing.
engSearchText:
That sounds like a plan to me. We should make sure
everyone knows we found her first thing.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 各方面にも連絡しておきます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
各方面にも連絡しておきます。

engChrName: And I should probably update my database with all this new information.
engSearchText:
And I should probably update my database with all
this new information.
jpnChrName: うーん、色々と記録できたし データベースを更新しなきゃ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、色々と記録できたし
データベースを更新しなきゃ……

engChrName: Never a dull moment for you, huh?
engSearchText: Never a dull moment for you, huh?
jpnChrName: なんて言うか…… アンタも色々と大変ね。
jpnSearchText:
なんて言うか……
アンタも色々と大変ね。

engChrName: Maybe, but that goes for you, too.
engSearchText: Maybe, but that goes for you, too.
jpnChrName: ま、そっちと同じくらいにはな。
jpnSearchText: ま、そっちと同じくらいにはな。

engChrName: Thanks for all the help. I'll make it up to you sometime.
engSearchText:
Thanks for all the help. I'll make it up to
you sometime.
jpnChrName: ──手伝ってくれて助かった。 この借りはそのうち返すぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──手伝ってくれて助かった。
この借りはそのうち返すぜ。

engChrName: Zeroth Form: Duality.
engSearchText: Zeroth Form: Duality.
jpnChrName: 零（れい）の型、《双影（ふたえ）》──
jpnSearchText: 零（れい）の型、《双影（ふたえ）》──

engChrName: Phew. Thank goodness—looks like I'm in good form tonight.
engSearchText:
Phew. Thank goodness—looks like I'm in good
form tonight.
jpnChrName: ──うん、                 今宵は中々冴えているかな。
jpnSearchText:
──うん、
今宵は中々冴えているかな。
